attributes.action: Ban Meghan Trainer "All About that bass"
attributes.additional_details:
Skinny Shaming is a form of bullying too, yes it's a catchy song but if you read the lyrics its vile and giving skinny people a complex.
If it was the other way round about larger people it wouldn't be played.
So i would like the government to take action and ban this song from Tv, radio and all form media.
We should be promoting a healthy lifestyle and not promoting an unhealthy lifestyle.
